name: staked USD1+
description: USD1+ is a synthetic U.S. dollar stablecoin developed by Lorenzo Labs, backed by WLFI USD1. It is the first stablecoin to combine Real-World Asset (RWA) yields with delta-neutral strategy yields, aiming to deliver superior returns. USD1+ maintains a 1:1 peg with traditional stablecoins and is designed as a rebasing token, with all positions ultimately settled into USD1. sUSD1+ is the staked version of USD1+, accruing yield over time through the same underlying mechanisms. Unlike USD1+, sUSD1+ is a value-accruing token, where the token price increases to reflect earned yield. USD1+ and sUSD1+ are fully interchangeable, allowing users to stake and unstake seamlessly based on their preferences.
